name: MailLister
author: Ofek Nakar

sections.description:
Mail Lister provide an easy solution to marketing system,
you can easily save and collect customers or visitors emails
and inside Mail Lister dashboard,you can send customized html5 emails
to you customers,our goal is to provide simple way to marketing emails,
all you need is to customize your newsletter with html5 and css you can
even add images or gifs, when you done you can edit your shorcode, copy it
and paste it on the page you wish to display MailLister form.

  • Easy to install
  • Easy to edit/manage
  • Genrate more Leads

A brief Example

Installation:

  1. Activate
  2. Navigate to Mail Lister Menu
  3. Customize your shortcode
  4. Copy & paste the short code on any page

Hello,Hola,Shalom from MapleWP :), if there any need or support issue,you can reach us via
Website maple-wp.com

MailLister MapleWP
sections.faq:
How can i use Mail Lister ?

you can use MailLister in many diffrent ways, mail lister main goal is to help you collect customer/visitors emails,
and then within the MailLister dashboard you can send custom emails to your customers

How Mail Lister can help me ?

mail lister provide you email marketing solution so if you need to collect
customers mails and send mail for discounts or to promote your products,
mail lister is the right solution for you

Mail lister is a newsletter ?

yes, one of mail lister capabilities is to send your subscribers an update through email

Where can i paste the shortocde ?

first you need to navigate to maillister editor
then copy the shortcode under share and paste on any page

The plugin support RTL ?

Yes the plugin support rtl

The plugin has Pro version ?

no, all free ðŸ™‚
